// const baseUrl = "https://auth.nomoreparties.co";
var baseUrl="http://localhost:3000";function checkResponse(res){return res.ok?res.json():Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));}export function autentification(email,pass){return fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/signup"),{method:"POST",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({password:pass,email:email})}).then(checkResponse);}export function autorisation(email,pass){return fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/signin"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({password:pass,email:email})}).then(checkResponse);}export function checkUser(jwt){return fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/users/me"),{method:"GET",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(jwt)}}).then(checkResponse);}
